publ: by Gomathy Shankaran (DBA Kidz Learn Applications)
name: Edison,NJLocalGuide
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. j. edison guide
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Edison, NJ Local Guide" help adults and give information on restaurants and attractions in and around Edison. It provides various information on restaurants based on 
i. cuisine name 
ii. meal type - breakfast, brunch, lunch, dinner, late night.
This skill gives detail information about the address, telephone number of the restaurant and also information on various cuisines.
Users can choose from the following cuisines :-
1. American
2. Mexican
3. Chinese
4. Italian
5. Japanese
6 . Kosher
7. Korean
8. Indian
9. Asian
10. Sushi
11. Greek
12. Mediterranean
13. Middle Eastern
This Alexa skill gives detail information about attractions in the Edison area. The distance of the attractions are approximated based on number of miles calculated from Thomas Edison Center.
User can ask :-
1. Recommend an attraction.
2. Recommend an attraction within 6 miles.
3. Go outside.
Thanks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
